{"id":847954238,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 1 week","timestamp":1669110641,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2344 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/847954238/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Perfect Squares","memory":"503.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int numSquares(int n) {\n        int arr[101];\n        arr[0]=-1;\n        for(int i=1;i<101;i++){\n            arr[i]=i*i;\n        }\n        int idx=-1;\n        for(int i=1;i<101;i++){\n            if(arr[i]>=n){\n                idx=i;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        queue<vector<int>>q;\n        q.push({n,0,idx});\n        while(!q.empty()){\n            vector<int> t=q.front();\n            q.pop();\n            if(t[0]<0) continue;\n            if(t[0]==0){\n                return t[1];\n            }\n            for(int i=t[2];i>=1;i--){\n            // cout<<\"check\"<<endl;\n                if(arr[i]<=t[0]){\n                    q.push({t[0]-arr[i],t[1]+1,i});\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return n;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"perfect-squares","has_notes":false}
